entry.title: New release for tillywork: v0.1.3 - Collaboration
entry.content:
New Features

  • Automations are now available. Create automations to save time on repetitive manual tasks
  • Receive notifications in your in-app inbox, or Slack (email notifications on the way)
  • Collaborate in real-time on cards. You now see which team members are updating the card you're on and see their updates in real time.

Full Changelog: https://github.com/tillywork/tillywork/compare/v0.1.2...v0.1.3
